import React, { useState } from "react"; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; function Login() { // const [fname, setFname] = useState(""); // const [lname, setLname] = useState(""); const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [pass, setPass] = useState(""); // const [uname, setUname] = useState(""); const [DataRecieved, setDataRecieved] = useState({}); let submit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(name); let Data = { name: name, pass: pass, }; const history =useHistory(); axios.post("http://localhost:3001/login", Data).then((response) => { console.log(response); setDataRecieved(response); }).then(DataRecieved.data==="Log In Successful!" ? localStorage.setItem("Uname",name): history.push()); console.log(pass); }; console.log("This is ", DataRecieved.data); return (
